processing_structure.text: Specify input and output: one integer, sum of its divisors
Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Check the overall flow: read n, compute the sum of its divisors, then print the sum.
Confirm top steps are clear: input, initialize sum, loop 1..n to test divisibility, add when divisible, output.
Begin coding: write a for-loop that iterates i from 1 to n, use a divisibility (remainder) test to add divisors to sum, then print the sum.
